Removed 'have been foolish enough to leave a paper trail', replaced it with 'have left a paper trail' - foolishness is a POV judgement
/* Cultural genocide */ The last sentence did not make sense, there is a legal definition of genocide and it includes the physical destruction of a group

/* Stages of genocide, influences leading to genocide, and efforts to prevent it */ removed silly paragraph, no one accused the US of genocide in the 19th century, the accusations were made post 1953 and it is a minority view.
/* Cambodia */ copied lead from Extraordinary Chambers in the Courts of Cambodia

rv Ottoman government killed more than just Armenian Christians. rv Where Milosevic died is not important, WHEN he died is. Karadzic is on trial (altered and footnoted).
Put back previous heading structure. removed a paragraph that was contradicted by the next one: There was nothing alleged about who came up with he word
Revert good faith change to the lead sentence. Shaw's is a very specific definition. A more general one is better in the lead sentence. Racial hatred, military expediency, and greed, are also motives
